nodes.text: I Am C-3PO: The Inside Story

I Am C-3PO: The Inside Story is an autobiography written by actor Anthony Daniels, chronicling his career playing the droid C-3PO in the Star Wars franchise. The book features a foreword by Star Wars sequel trilogy director J.J. Abrams. It was first published in the United Kingdom in hardcover by Dorling Kindersley Limited on October 31, 2019. DK Publishing released the first United States hardcover edition on November 5, 2019, and a U.S. paperback edition is scheduled to be released on November 3, 2020.
